name: silverstripe/recipe-form-building
description: A recipe of modules to help you build forms in SilverStripe

suggest.silverstripe/gridfieldqueuedexport: Export large data sets from your GridField in the SilverStripe CMS interface through async jobs
suggest.symbiote/silverstripe-queuedjobs: if using gridfieldqueuedexport you can batch background jobs with this module
